info.title: SwitchLanController
info.author: Leandro Puentes Rivas
info.description: Use N. Switch as a Wireless LAN joystick
info.details:
Use your Nintendo Switch as a wireless LAN joystick. 
Steps:
1- Download and install the server on your PC (https://github.com/devnull-tech/SwitchLanController-Server)
1.2- Just follow the repo's steps it will be more verbose in the future
2- Install the SwitchLanController-Client (this app) on your switch
3- Connect PC and Switch in the same network
4- Run the server and then open the app
5- Type your PC ip address and connect

changelog: V1.0 - First release\n- Basic functionalities, everything seems to be going well.\n
